<title level="1" right="Action">[Act Together](/Actions.aspx?ID=758) <actions string="Single Action to Three Actions" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Summoner" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=392" />
<trait label="Tandem" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=395" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 53 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Frequency** once per round

</column>

---

You and your eidolon act as one. Either you or your eidolon takes an action or activity using the same number of actions as Act Together, and the other takes a single action. For example, if you spent 2 actions to Act Together, you could cast [_burning hands_](/Spells.aspx?ID=30) (2 actions) and your eidolon could Strike (1 action), or your eidolon could use its Breath Weapon (2 actions) and you could Stride (1 action).

 This lets you each use separate [exploration](/Traits.aspx?ID=66) activities like [Avoid Notice](/Actions.aspx?ID=511) as you travel.
name: Act Together
